title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' and previewed in PDF
EB: I expected the label to disappear
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the PDF emitter
2. Set the display property of the item to 'none'
3. Preview the PDF
4. Verify if the label is still visible
